summary: SummaryThe gentlest daily face wash you‚Äôll ever meet. Kate Somerville's Goat Milk Moisturizing Cleanser is formulated to remove makeup, dirt, oil and impurities and soothe skin without tightness or irritation. Sulfate-free and clinically tested safe for sensitive skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsCleanses gently without overdryingNourishes dry + sensitive skinCreamy formula relieves tight skinKey IngredientsGoat Milk : Soothes dry, sensitive skin with natural milk proteins.Manuka Honey: Nourishes skin without any tightness, dryness or irritation.Research Results100% of users demonstrated an improvement in skin softness & suppleness immediately and after 1 week of use.100% of users demonstrated an improvement in skin barrier function after 1 week of use.100% of users demonstrated an improvement in skin moisturization immediately and after 1 week of use, with a 46% rise in hydration right away.*based on a clinical study of 30 panelists.Item 2538071How To UseGood for: Morning + EveningHow often: DailyApplication: Apply a small amount to damp face and neck and massage gently for 30 seconds. Rinse and gently pat dry.IngredientsWater Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Betaine, Glyceryl Distearate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Xylitylglucoside, Propanediol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprae Lac (Goat Milk, Lait de Ch√®vre), Lactose, Milk Protein, Lactic Acid, Tocopherol, Mel Extract (Honey Extract, Extrait de Miel), Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Bisabolol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Xylitol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Anhydroxylitol, Parfum/Fragrance, Stearic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Xanthan Gum, t-butyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Good for: Morning + EveningHow often: DailyApplication: Apply a small amount to damp face and neck and massage gently for 30 seconds. Rinse and gently pat dry.

reviews.headline: My new favorite cleanser
reviews.comments: This stuff feels so good on my skin I literally look forward to using it. I never consistently washed my face (even before bed üò≥) and with this im cleansing twice a day. LOVE love this cleanser

reviews.headline: really helps with redness
reviews.comments: I think this is my new all-time favorite cleanser wow, so gentle yet my skin feels clean and soothed. love this!

reviews.headline: So many compliments on my skin!
reviews.comments: I switched to Kate Somerville products almost three months ago. Ive teied everything under the sun, but am completely blown away by the improvement in my skin's appearance, feel, texture‚Ä¶ everything! I have always had a hard time keeping up with an am/pm routine, but with Kate, i look forward to spending 10-15 minutes every morning and evening with these luxurious products. I almost have the whole line! Definitely start with this goat milk cleanser. It's incredible!

Used to have really bad acne and broke out using so many different products just to try and clear my skin but THIS works cleared my skin within the 1st month and now i live by this! This will be my forever cleanser also doesnt smell bad which is a huge plus because i hate chemical smelling cleansers 10/10 recommend 

I have combination skin which tends to go super dry after cleansing and oily in shortly after and this gives my skin the perfect balance for a normal feel.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I have oily skin and wear a full face everyday. Whenever i use this cleanser my face always feels freah and really clean. I love the soft scent so much! My fave never feels striped. It always leaves it soft and silky.

reviews.headline: I wanted to love it‚Ä¶
reviews.comments: I had my eyes on this cleanser for a few months and when the time came around to purchase a new cleanser I was so excited to finally try this. The ingredient makeup seemed like it was going to be ideal for my skin. The consistency of this is more comparable to a gel cleanser than a milk cleanser in my opinion. That being said; it acted like a gel cleanser as well. I gave it multiple tries; but it left my skin stripped (like the post-castile soap tight/dry feeling) so I ended up returning. That alone is enough to make me run for the hills; but if you have any sort of sensitivies to fragrance beware this is an incredibly fragranced product; due to this I experience some sensitivity near the eye area (obviously not in or on my eye). Steer clear if you like having a moisture barrier!

reviews.headline: Help! I cant stop!
reviews.comments: I have been wanting to try this forever, and since I have, I'll never turn back. I have dry-combination skin with psoriasis, and this cleanser is so beautiful for my skin. It never leaves me feeling stripped, it's so creamy and my skin feels so clean and moisturized after. I love the subtle, natural smell to it. I love when I get to use it and look forward to it. The beautiful thing is that Ulta frequently has it on sale‚Ä¶ it's not always loud so be on watch. I now have two bottles in back stock since I've purchased my first and I have yet to pay full price. Stock up on sale, girlies. TRY on sale - so worth it. We've been lucky but I'd pay full price for this, easy.

reviews.headline: Beware, this is a staple item!
reviews.comments: I've had an issue with breakouts since I was a teenager and this has cleared it all right up! I've switched back to Thayers, which used to do well with my skin, only to break out horribly while I await my new bottle. Seriously, get it.

reviews.headline: Finally, a cleanser for my reactive skin
reviews.comments: My skin reacts to everything. I have to suffer through most trials before finding whats gonna work. At 33, I had yet yo gind a cleanser that didnt leave most of my skin with that tight, stripped feeling- or not clean at all. This is it!! After a couple pf weeks. I can safely say I'll never buy another cleanser as this exists. Its worth the price to finally have something that works on my whole face, not just my t zone or just my cheeks. My forehead and cheeks get super dry, I have oily acne prone nose- but this helped with it all. Hydrating for cheeks and forehead, but cleansing enough for my nose. Very little goes a long way too! Love love love

reviews.headline: New favorite
reviews.comments: My new favorite cleanser. So hydrating !!

reviews.headline: Keep in rotation
reviews.comments: Im a fan of switching up certain products, and face wash is one of them. I use this one whenever my skin is feeling dry or itchy. If I have used other products recently that irritated my skin, then I reach for this one because I know it will work but feel very mild. I read another review that said it smelled bad. I have not had that experience. Smells nice to me.

reviews.headline: Smells very bad
reviews.comments: I normally love Kate Somerville products, but the smell of this cleanser is awful.  It smells like feet and definitely isn't something I want to put near or on my face. Very disappointing.

reviews.headline: BUY IT
reviews.comments: This stuff is absolutely amazing!!!! I've struggled for so long to find a face wash that doesn't dry my skin out and helps my redness among other things and this stuff has helped my redness SO much and my face is so smooth and moisturized. BUY IT !! Can't say enough good things.

reviews.headline: Amazing for dry, flaky skin
reviews.comments: I have super dry skin to the point where I was exfoliating & dry brushing too often because it felt like the only option to get rid of my flaky skin before a night out. This face wash single handedly saved my skin. I no longer have flaky facial skin and it has helped even out my skin tone as well. Amongst all of the very expensive moisturizers that I've tried, this product has made the most obvious difference!

reviews.headline: just ok
reviews.comments: An ok cleanser for the skin but does not remove eye make-up.

reviews.headline: Black Woman Review for Sensitive Skin
reviews.comments: I recently switched from Dermalogica Daily Microexfoliant to this product. This is the is off the chain for sensitive skin. I am unsure if it has real goat milk but my skin feels squeaky clean after piling serums, moisturizer, and sunscreen. Please bear in mind I do not wear makeup, therefore I cannot speak for those that want to use this cleanser to remove makeup. I am a simple girl that use to suffer from severe acne. I am giving my honest review and I was not paid or even sent this product. Thanks for reading my honest reviews.

reviews.headline: Best Face Wash Ever!!
reviews.comments: Used this one time and was amazed by the results. My skin feels so soft and all of my blackheads around my nose are gone! 10/10 would recommend for people with sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Best cleanser ever!
reviews.comments: This is the best cleanser I have ever used! I have sensitive dry skin and it's helped my skin so much especially in the colder months! I 10/10 recommend this to anybody!

reviews.headline: Worth the price
reviews.comments: Best facial cleanser on the market. I have oily and dry skin around T zones and it has helped tremendously.

reviews.headline: Rich and mild creamy cleanser
reviews.comments: This product is very rich and gorgeous to use.  It's very pricey but seems worth the splurge.

faceoff_positive.comments: I also got this as a diamond perk. I have used the old formula and this one is much improved. The old one separated and hardened into globs that resembled hardened honey making it difficult to get out of the tube. It was also very balm like bordering on greasy. This version  is white and fluffy; hydrating  but not oily. It rinses off nicely. I have very dry skin but think anyone could use this. It has much better mass appeal that the original formula which I would not have repurchased. I would still double cleanse if wearing a full face of makeup but one cleanse with this is perfect for a morning cleanse or a minimal makeup evening cleanse. It's very pleasant to use and I'm glad I had another opportunity to try it. It leaves my skin feeling clean and smooth.
faceoff_positive.headline: Much Improved

faceoff_negative.comments: I had my eyes on this cleanser for a few months and when the time came around to purchase a new cleanser I was so excited to finally try this. The ingredient makeup seemed like it was going to be ideal for my skin. The consistency of this is more comparable to a gel cleanser than a milk cleanser in my opinion. That being said; it acted like a gel cleanser as well. I gave it multiple tries; but it left my skin stripped (like the post-castile soap tight/dry feeling) so I ended up returning. That alone is enough to make me run for the hills; but if you have any sort of sensitivies to fragrance beware this is an incredibly fragranced product; due to this I experience some sensitivity near the eye area (obviously not in or on my eye). Steer clear if you like having a moisture barrier!
faceoff_negative.headline: I wanted to love it‚Ä¶
